snippet: Edwards led for only 15 laps but won the Southern 500, a Nascar Sprint Cup race, at Darlington Raceway in South Carolina, edging Brad Keselowski and Denny Hamlin.
abstract: Carl Edwards wins Southern 500, Darlington Raceway Nascar Sprint Cup race.
lead_paragraph: Edwards led for only 15 laps but won the Southern 500, a Nascar Sprint Cup race, at Darlington Raceway in South Carolina, edging Brad Keselowski and Denny Hamlin.
